results.original_title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
results.overview: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.
results.title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf

results.overview: Journey into the extraordinary world of "The Witcher" — from casting the roles to Jaskier's catchy song — in this behind-the-scenes look at the series. Go behind the monsters, the ballads and every bit of magic that went into bringing The Witcher's Continent to life.
results.title: Making the Witcher

results.overview: Game intro for  "The Witcher", by Tomasz Baginski.
results.title: The Witcher

results.original_title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Live Concert
results.overview: Experience the award winning music of The Witcher III: Wild Hunt and both its expansions, Hearts of Stone & Blood Wine, in a never before seen way, performed live during Film Music Festival 2016 in Kraków, Poland.  Video Game Show — The Witcher III: Wild Hunt concert was organized by CD PROJEKT RED in cooperation with Kraków Festival Office.
results.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Live Concert

results.overview: Fan short film in the world of Witcher.
results.title: Witcher – Mines of Eeclor

results.overview: The adventures of Geralt of Rivia, commonly known as the Witcher.
results.title: The Witcher

results.overview: To a give inn town a young man with him girlfriend returns. It is the last member of a family who, without knowing it, is going to fulfill an old curse: to end another family who many years before had killed him relatives. A psychiatrist helps the police to unravel the atrocious crime, in which they are themselves implied ghost and living deads.
results.title: Witchery deal

results.overview: The deserted island hotel hides a dark and sinister secret. Hundreds of years ago a witch held sway there, dominating her coven and spreading an evil that has seeped deep into the earth. Two centuries later, a photographer and his virginal fiance sneak onto the island to research its gruesome history. Soon all will find themselves falling victim to a horror that has survived the ages....
results.title: Witchery

results.overview: Shot in Tuxtlas, Veracruz, this documentary exposes the ideological conceptions of witches, healers and patients, with respect to traditional medicine.
results.title: Witchers and healers

results.overview: Secret number... secret shape... knower of the secret name... God of the realm of night - I summon you, 'Son of Sin'... arise!
results.title: Witchery

results.overview: Jade seems happily married but he starts having nightmares about hopping corpses, followed by psychotic episodes, which cause him to kill his wife and then any romantic interests that follow. He's then hounded by the ghosts of his victims.
results.title: Black Magic
